casebody.data:
2001-3204 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Samson BRILEY. No. 2001-KO-3204. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Briley, Samson-Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. G, No. 415-685; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-KA-0143.

Denied.

4
